job.title: Senior Systems Administrator
job.description:
Reporting to the Senior Managing Director of IT & Infrastructure, as Senior Systems Administrator/DevOps Engineer you are responsible for the core network and software development. This position requires technical acumen, customer focus, and a personable, professional and collaborative style to solve a range of issues. The focus of this position will be on the development of software and automation for our exhibits and mobile devices. The Senior Systems Administrator/DevOps Engineer is also responsible for the core network that runs our public- and staff-related systems, including a wide range of Cisco equipment, our Mac-based exhibit technology, AV systems, IP phone system, Comcast broadband, routing and switching, fail-over and redundancy technologies, and our internal copper and fiber and Wi-Fi technologies.
What You Will Be Doing
Systems Administration
Help with systems upgrade and development
Design and implement build, deployment, and configuration management
Build and test automation tools for infrastructure provisioning
Handle code deployments in all environments
Provide technical guidance and educate team members and coworkers on development and operations
Build, maintain, and monitor configuration standards
Maintain day-to-day management and administration of projects
Document and design various processes; update existing processes
Improve infrastructure development and application development
Monitor and maintain the operational health of the local and wide area networks.
Install, configure, and support networking and security equipment from Cisco and other vendors as appropriate;
What You Need for this Position
3+ years experience in a Sys Admin role or equivalent
Background working with Cisco switches
Cisco administration
Scripting experience is highly preferred (bash, php, python)
HTML/CSS and android mobile applications experience preferred
So, if you are a Senior Systems Administrator with experience, please apply today!
